title: Soul wisp
data:
***[Trunk](/Trunk "Trunk")-only**: This article pertains to a feature of Crawl which is being tested. It will likely change before the next release, and may even be removed entirely.*

- *This page is a **[stub](/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. You could probably [expand this page](http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Soul_wisp\&action=edit) should you wish to do so.*

| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A tiny fragment of a living soul, splintered from the body in which it belongs. Too mindless to be fully controlled, it seeks nothing but to reunite with its greater self once more - unfortunately, this process tends to be more violent than the magic which created it. |

## Useful Info

**Soul wisps** are fragments of a monster's soul, created by [Soul Splinter](/Soul_Splinter "Soul Splinter"). They spawn adjacent to the monster they come from and fixate on that monster.

## Tips & Tricks

## History

- In [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), soul wisps will be added to the game as part of [Soul Splinter](/Soul_Splinter "Soul Splinter").
html:
Soul wisp

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Trunk-only: This article pertains to a feature of Crawl which is being tested. It will likely change before the next release, and may even be removed entirely.
This page is a stub. You could probably expand this page should you wish to do so.
soul wisp * 
HP 5-12
HD 2
XP 14
Speed 10
AC 3
EV 11
Will 10
Attack1 4 (touch: plain)


Resistances rC+
rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Brainless
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Undead
Size Small
Type soul wisp, soul wisp
Flags Flying
See invisible
Insubstantial
Evil
Unbreathing
A tiny fragment of a living soul, splintered from the body in which it belongs. Too mindless to be fully controlled, it seeks nothing but to reunite with its greater self once more - unfortunately, this process tends to be more violent than the magic which created it.

Useful Info

Soul wisps are fragments of a monster's soul, created by Soul Splinter. They spawn adjacent to the monster they come from and fixate on that monster.

Tips & Tricks

History

  • In 0.32, soul wisps will be added to the game as part of Soul Splinter.
